#   This list contains IP addresses associated with Amazon AWS infrastructure.
#   
#   Amazon provides leased servers and services such as hosted applications
#   and analytics platforms. Customers can rent virtual servers through AWS
#   on a subscription basis and use them for a wide range of purposes.
#   
#   Although illegal activity violates Amazon's Terms of Service, abuse does
#   occur. This blocklist allows you to prevent communication between your
#   server and AWS-hosted systems.
#   
#   If you believe an AWS server is being used to attack your infrastructure,
#   report the abuse at:
#      - https://repost.aws/knowledge-center/report-aws-abuse
